skillTree.localised_description: Dark Elf Beastmasters roam the wilds atop their dreaded chariots, armed with barbed nets and harpoons to slay the foe and ensnare their prey.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

target_if: Unit is not Lord or Hero

enabled_if: Unit has exceeded the murderous prowess value

skillTree.localised_description: The roar of a Manticore is guaranteed to send mortals fleeing, for they know a creature of terror is abroad.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.

target_if: Unit is not Lord or Hero

enabled_if: Unit has exceeded the murderous prowess value

skillTree.localised_description: No creature outmatches the Black Dragon Bracchus in terms of sheer cruelty and the ability to inflict pain, save for Rakarth himself!

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.

target_if: Unit is not Lord or Hero

enabled_if: Unit has exceeded the murderous prowess value

skillTree.localised_description: There is great pleasure to be derived from the humiliation and suffering of others; this one has felt and revelled in it.
The strength of this warrior's attack never wavers for an instance, such is the opprobrium felt for their hated High Elf cousins.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against High Elves

skillTree.localised_description: The honing of a Druchii's affinity with animals assures that the bestial ranks heed his imperious command with obedience.

effects.description:
Charge bonus: +10 for Cold One Knights, Cold One Dread Knights and Cold One Chariot units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +10 for Harpies, War Hydra, Kharibdyss, Black Dragon, Feral Manticore and Bloodwrack Medusae units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The Bloody-handed God watches over his disciples.
Magic's dark mistress has a care for her dutiful acolytes.
Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +20%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +35%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +50%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: "Fly my pretties, fly!"

effects.description:
Armour-piercing weapon damage: +5 for Harpies units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: What need is there to feed creatures perfectly capable of feeding themselves?

effects.description: Casualty replenishment rate: +5% when in foreign territory

Enemy casualty replenishment rate: -10%
	(enemy armies in local province)

skillTree.localised_description: "The Beastmasters were so preoccupied with whether or not they could, they didn't stop to think if they should."

effects.description:
Melee attack: +8 for War Hydra and Kharibdyss units
	(Lord's army)

Passive ability: "Abyssal Howl" for Hydra units
	(Lord's army)

Ability: "Frost Breath" for Kharibdyss units
	(Lord's army)

ui_effects.localised_text: Requires line of sight to the target

skillTree.localised_description: Extracting the claws of captive Harpies without suffering injury requires a control that few Beastmasters possess, but yields armaments most useful for beast-catching.

effects.description: Increased chance monsters will be added to the Monster Pens while raiding, fighting battles, or occupying settlements

Scourgerunner Chariots and Reaper Bolt Throwers gain Harpyclaw ammunition, which reduces enemy movement speed on hit
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: "They're lethal at eight months, and I do mean lethal. I've hunted most things that can hunt you, but the way these things move…"

effects.description:
Recruit rank: +3 for Cold One Knights, Cold One Dread Knights and Cold One Chariot units
	(all armies factionwide)

Attribute: Stalk for Feral Cold Ones, Cold One Knights, and Cold One Dread Knights
	(Lord's army)

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can move hidden in any terrain.

skillTree.localised_description: In the wild, there is no such thing as good and evil, only predators and prey.

effects.description: Hidden effect to boost recruit rank of Monsters in the faction pool

Recruit rank: +3 for Harpies, War Hydra, Bloodwrack Medusa, Kharibdyss, Black Dragon and Feral units
	(all armies factionwide)

Weapon strength: +10% for Black Dragon units
	(Lord's army)

Passive ability: "Murderous Prowess" for monstrous units
	(Lord's army)

enabled_if: Unit has exceeded the murderous prowess value

skillTree.localised_description: The tough, scaly hide of the Sea Dragon provides excellent protection against all manner of blows.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
Full-Plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
What the enemy cannot see, it cannot hit. What the enemy cannot see, it cannot survive.
Beastmasters share their minions’ belligerence, cutting down foemen with lash, spear, and harpoon before claiming their twitching bodies as fodder.
There are Lords that radiate power, confidence and fear, inspiring their followers to great or terrible acts.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +75
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Magic is a most useful tool on the field of battle, but generally secondary in the face of good, old-fashioned brute force.

skillTree.localised_description: Marshalling missile troops effectively - even elites - is all about timing.

skillTree.localised_description: The most effective raiders have a plan that is certain to succeed and stick to it; this one ensures that they do.

skillTree.localised_description: Judicious, or even not-so-judicious, use of the lash tends to get the desired results, so why hold back?

skillTree.localised_description: An elite even amongst elites, this accomplished warrior directs the cut-and-thrust of melee - a choreographer of death, you might say.

skillTree.localised_description: Some beasts are only tamed, or dominated, by some manner of being an order of magnitude stronger, in will if not in muscle.

effects.description:
Leadership: -8 for enemy monstrous units
	(enemy armies in local province)

attributes.bullet_text:
A Rampaging unit is uncontrollable and will attack the nearest enemy unit.
	When there are no enemy units nearby, a Rampaging unit will move around randomly instead.

skillTree.localised_description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.
This Lord expects utter obedience from the smallfolk, and has little time for insurrections or petty revolts.
This one ensures that those captured in battle wished they'd died on the field, so great is the cruelty that awaits them.
"You will serve me, wretch, or you will die, there is no other option."
If there were annals detailing the dastardly deeds of the sackers and looters of the world, this inveterate brigand would feature heavily.
Someone has to ensure the numbers and quality of recruits remain high.
"The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.localised_description: A good quartermaster can ration equipment and foodstuffs efficiently, making supplies last longer.
Knowing precisely where and when to launch an ambush, and against who, takes an unusual level of guile.

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can deploy outside the deployment zone.

skillTree.localised_description: The ancient Asur arts teach one how to heal as well as how to harm.

Attrition: -10% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -30% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: This Lord's many deeds - both on and off the battlefield - have brought them renown among their allies and made them feared by their enemies.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +25% chance of wounding aggressors

attributes.bullet_text: When bracing, this unit negates the charge bonus of any large attacker.
When bracing, this unit causes additional damage when attacking charging enemies.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

target_if: Unit is not Lord or Hero

enabled_if: Unit has exceeded the murderous prowess value

factionEffects.localised_description: Rakarth's monstrous menagerie roams the world, stripping cities bare as efficiently as carrion stripped from a corpse.

effects.description: Monster Pens: Capture a variety of hideous beasts and send them into battle
Forces do not receive Vigour penalties from Raiding stance

Upkeep: -10% for all monstrous units
	(all armies)
